summary: Four young offenders and their care workers visit the remote Yorkshire village of Mortlake, which prides on keeping itself to itself. A minor incident with locals rapidly escalates into a blood-soaked, deliriously warped nightmare.
cast: Jo Hartley|James Doherty|Seamus O'Neill|James Burrows|Terry Haywood|Nadine Mulkerrin|Chris Waller|Neil Leiper|Derek Melling|Damien Lloyd-Davies|Mark Rathbone|Ted Metcalf|Dominic Brunt|Mat Fraser|George Newton|Michael Sanderson|Neil Keenan|Martin Howard|Lee Jerrum|Emily Booth|Marc Ryan-Jordan|Pat Lally|Matt Russell|Gus Bousfield|Julian Butler|Alice Walker|Grace Walker|Georgina Walker|Turkish|Peter Slater|Dave Andrews|Mark Newby|Joz Rhodes
title: Engendros
